about_the_game:
STORY MODE

Experience true psychological horror in Story Mode, a first-person adventure. Hired as a paranormal investigator, you're sent to uncover the secrets behind the disappearance of a mysterious owner. However, as you step inside his eerie home, you realize this case is far more terrifying than you ever imagined.

MULTIPLAYER

Team up with your friends and scream together as the puppet hunts you down in this thrilling co-op horror experience. Your mission is to break the curse, burn the dolls and escape as quickly as possible. But be warned, every move you be your last.

FEATURES

  • Realistic graphics
  • Voice acting
  • A singleplayer campaign
  • Online co-op
  • Proximity voice chat

content_descriptors.notes: Small amounts of blood and gore, dark themes.

name: PUPPETEERS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or New-Gen i3 or the AMD equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or the AMD equivalent.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one.
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements may not be completely accurate.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or better.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one.
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements may not be completely accurate.

short_description: PUPPETEERS is a spine chilling indie horror game. Play online with your friends or solo in a singleplayer campaign, and try your best to escape the puppets.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Japanese, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish
*languages with full audio support
